title: Smart Data Models - Wastewater Treatment base schema
description: Common NGSI-LD definitions of a wastewater treatment data models

tss.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'mg/L'. total suspended solids concentration measured in a tank

nh4.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'mg/L'. Ammonium concentration measured in a tank

no3.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'mg/L'. Nitrate concentration measured in wastewater

do.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'mg/L'. Dissolved Oxygen concentration measured in wastewater

redox.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'mV'. Redox level measured in wastewater

tn.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'mg/L'. Total Nitrogen concentration measured in wastewater

temperature.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'Celsius'. Wastewater temperature measured

pH.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Water pH level measured
